posts.post_content:
Interested in any/all Piedmont Art Stamps.

Happy to do outright purchase(s) and will pay top dollar.  Plenty of stuff to trade as well if that’s your thing.

One of my duplicates (available for trade) for your viewing pleasure:

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras/websize/1914%20Snodgrass%2025%20_extra%202_.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras/websize/1914%20Snodgrass%2025%20_extra%202_%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]
